name: CORE LAYER
description: Beneath an Eidolon's layers is its core - its truest and most vulnerable form. The Eidolon's core has no shards. Any shards on the field when this layer is revealed are immediately vaporized, destroyed in the blink of an eye. Once the core is destroyed, the Eidolon is defeated.

name: ADAMANT
description: An infinite metallic lattice; a rigid bulwark of oily darkness; a confusion of needles suspended in space; a loved one, furious.

name: BLURRED
description: A coherent pocket of rapid movement; a shimmering blindness; a person, rapidly aging but never decaying.

name: FUNDAMENTAL
description: A white, polished marble statue; a bruised and battered person dripping with corrosive oils; your father or mentor, terrified and weeping.

name: MARINE
description: A deep depth lit from even deeper space; the white of an endless crashing wave; a water-bloated body, unidentifiable.

name: ENCELADIAN
description: Pure white sea ice from which deep cracks sound; a gray haze through which blue light can be seen; a pane of steaming black glass, marbled with frost
